newsitem.title: FRANCE: France reports mixed bids for EU wheat, barley.
newsitem.headline: France reports mixed bids for EU wheat, barley.

text.p: European grain exporters bid through France on Thursday for 323,750 tonnes of soft wheat with taxes or refunds in the main European Union export tender on Thursday, French cereals office ONIC said.

They also bid for 41,000 tonnes of taxed or subsidised soft wheat in a secondary tender for African, Caribbean and Pacific importers and sought 100,000 tonnes of barley for general export, it said in a trade announcement.
An ONIC official said afterwards the barley bids were all for export refunds between 19.48 and 27.25 Ecus per tonne.
Following is the breakdown of bids. Bids for taxes or
refunds (ref.) are in Ecus per tonne.
MAIN TENDER Tonnage Range of Bids Tonnage Range of Bids
ACP TENDER Tonnage Range of Bids Tonnage Range of Bids
Soft wheat 10,000 0.02-0.27 Tax 18,200 Tax, not given
